name: Layered Fruit Bars
author: Karla Essner
instructions: Cream margarine, brown sugar, and vanilla in large bowl at medium speed of electric mixer until light and fluffy. Mix in flour and salt. Reserve 1⁄2 cup of mixture and 1 cup of quick rolled oats. Press remaining mixture evenly in ungreased 13 x 9 inch pan. Bake at 375° for 10 minutes.
